thread.title: Israeli couple 'were massacred right in front of their 4 kids'
thread.title_full: Israeli couple 'were massacred right in front of their 4 kids' | News24

author: news24.com
title: Israeli couple 'were massacred right in front of their 4 kids'
text:
Jerusalem - Palestinian gunmen killed an Israeli couple travelling in a car with their four young children in the occupied West Bank on Thursday, the Israeli army said, vowing reprisals for the "barbaric attack" amid a spike in tensions.
The couple's children, aged four months to nine years old, were lightly injured in the shooting between the Jewish settlements of Itamar and Elon Moreh and taken to hospital.
The victims were named as Eitam and Naama Henkin, both in their 30s and residents of the central West Bank settlement of Neria, near Ramallah.
They "were massacred right in front of their four children", Israeli army spokesperson Peter Lerner said in a statement.
